Content:
CITES Certificate
Send via Express for CITES shipments.
Know Your Customer and POA
KYC and POA mandatory for all non-document imports—provide to UPS pre-clearance.
Packing List
Required for multi-package shipments—separate or combined with invoice.
MSDS-NON DG
IATA A67 goods (e.g., batteries) need MSDS—advisable for UAE transits.
Info About Section Header: This section explains the paperwork needed when bringing goods into India.
Simplified Form: - *KYC/POA*: Mandatory for all non-docs—give UPS before clearance.
- *Packing List*: Needed for multiple packages—add separately or on invoice.
- *MSDS*: Batteries need MSDS—include for UAE transits.

Content:
SED-(New Electronic Export System)
Italy exports need electronic declaration—UPS handles EAD/MRN, except temp exports.
National Requirements
CITES exports from Venice (VCE) only—non-licensed need 'dichiarazione di libera esportazione'.
Info About Section Header: This section covers the documents required when sending goods out of India.
Simplified Form: - *Italy Exports*: Electronic declaration—UPS provides EAD/MRN, not for temp exports.
- *CITES*: Export via Venice only—non-licensed need free export declaration.

Content:
Custom Requirements
All shipments need air waybill in IDIS—non-docs need invoice too, or face delays.
Customs Clearance Process
IEC and GST numbers required for commercial—non-docs in doc bags fined, abandoned after 30 days.
E-Way Bill
>INR 50,000 needs E-Way bill for interstate—importer provides, UPS assists.
Bureau of Indian Standards
BIS cert for specific goods—check compulsory list.
Post Office Boxes
Full address + phone required—no P.O. Boxes, mobile mandatory for KYC.
MRP Labeling
Prepackaged retail needs MRP, name, importer details on label.
Clearance Comments
Docs only in doc bags—non-docs (e.g., CDs, tokens) in non-doc bags; chemicals need MAWB.
Gifts & Samples
<INR 10,000 samples duty-free—gifts dutiable since Dec 2019.
Info About Section Header: This section provides details on customs processes in India.
Simplified Form: - *Docs*: Air waybill in IDIS—non-docs need invoice, or delayed.
- *Clearance*: IEC + GST for commercial—non-docs in doc bags fined, 30-day limit.
- *E-Way*: >INR 50,000 interstate needs bill—importer gives, UPS helps.
- *Address*: Full details + phone—no P.O. Boxes, mobile for KYC.
- *MRP*: Retail packs need price, name, importer on label.
- *Rules*: Docs in doc bags—non-docs separate; chemicals via MAWB.

Content:
Service to select cities—check postal codes.
No service to Andaman, Nicobar, Lakshadweep.
Full address + phone—no P.O. Boxes, mobile mandatory.
Rest Days: Sun, holidays.
GMT: +0550
Language: English
Currency: INR
Info About Section Header: This section lists shipping locations in India.
Simplified Form: - *Address*: Full details + phone—no P.O. Boxes, mobile required.

Content:
Duties and Taxes
Bill to shipper, receiver, or third party—surcharge if outside India.
Shipping Charges
Bill to shipper, receiver, or third party—needs account number.
COD not available—use Free Domicile.
Payment Methods
Shipper only for card, check, cash.
Split Duty And VAT
Freight/duties to shipper/third party, taxes to receiver/third party—surcharge applies.
Third-Party Billing
Domestic can’t bill outside—EU exception with VAT ID.
Info About Section Header: This section explains payment options for shipping to India.
Simplified Form: - *Who Pays*: Duties/taxes to shipper, receiver, or third party—extra fee if outside India.
- *Shipping Costs*: Bill to shipper, receiver, or third party—needs account.
- *Payment*: Shipper only for card, check, cash.
- *Split Billing*: Freight/duties one party, taxes another—surcharge applies.
- *Third-Party*: India-to-India can’t bill outside—EU okay with VAT ID.

Content:
Radios
Need import license from WPC.
Jewelry
≤$2,500 precious in cargo only—artificial unrestricted.
Leather
WLRO NOC + origin cert.
Telecom/Satellite
IMEI on phones, WPC license for satellite.
Chemicals
MSDS + analysis—CRCL may test.
Clothing
Pre-shipment cert from accredited lab—25% sampled.
Nutritional Supplements
Drug Controller NOC.
Drugs/Vitamins
ADC NOC—scientific name on invoice.
Cellular Phones
IMEI mandatory.
Brochures/Catalogs
Non-docs if with samples—catalogs dutiable.
SIM Card
DOT NOC for resale.
Tapes
Synopsis + docs—censorship delays.
Pakistan Goods
200% duty.
Food
FSSAI NOC—personal needs passport/Form-7.
Textiles
Testing cert for dyes.
Medical Items
Health Dept NOC—2-3 day delay.
Televisions
Color TVs in cargo with DGFT license.
Info About Section Header: This section lists special rules for shipping goods to India.
Simplified Form: - *Telecom/Satellite*: IMEI on phones, WPC for satellite.
- *TVs*: Color via cargo with DGFT license.

Content:
Value: 0 INR
No gift exemption—77% duty on assessable value.
Perishables, plants, jewelry, supplements, drugs, food banned as gifts.
Info About Section Header: This section explains gift tax exemptions in India.
Simplified Form: - *Gifts*: No exemption—77% duty; no perishables, jewelry, drugs, food.

Content:
Paperless Invoice
Accepted for imports/exports.
Invoice
Full shipper/importer details, matching KYC—phone, email, HS code, purpose mandatory.
Info About Section Header: This section details invoice requirements for India.
Simplified Form: - *Invoice*: Full shipper/importer info, match KYC—add phone, email, HS code, purpose.

Content: Cash letters, manuscripts, tickets, reports, blueprints, checks—up to 2 kg.
Info About Section Header: This section lists items treated as documents for India.
Simplified Form: - *Documents*: Letters, tickets, reports, blueprints, checks—≤2 kg.

Content:
Antiques/Artwork
ISC only—art needs appraisal if >$100.
Animal Products/Plants
Banned.
Consumables/Perishables
Cargo only—NOC needed; no gifts/samples.
Passports
Embassy only.
E-Cigs
Banned.
Lithium Batteries
UN3480 embargoed by airlines.
Publications/Maps
Incorrect India maps banned.
Used Electronics
MOEF NOC.
Drones
DGCA cert + SIL required.
Single-Use Plastic
Banned since July 2022.
Samples
≤5 pieces—specific items banned.
Computers
HSN 8741 restricted—license needed.
Seeds
Plant Quarantine NOC—cargo only.
Personal Effects
Cargo only—travel docs required.
Used Items
SIL from DGFT.
Guns
Banned—exceptions for licensed shooters.
Info About Section Header: This section lists banned or restricted items in India.

Content:
Italy to India
Express Saver, Expedited, Freight Midday, Economy DDU/DDP, Express Plus, Express, Freight
Info About Section Header: This section lists shipping services from Italy to India.
Simplified Form: - *Italy to India*: Pick Express Saver, Expedited, Freight Midday, Economy DDU/DDP, Plus, Express, Freight—check UPS.

Content:
Temporary Import
Ata Carnet for exhibits (6 months), Triptyque for vehicles (6-12 months).
Raw Materials
Duty-free in bonded warehouse—pay, then reclaim on export.
Samples
<INR 10,000 duty-free—mark 'SAMPLES FREE'.
Solid Wood
ISPM 15 cert for raw >6mm.
Repair and Return
List details, serial, repair cost—duty on repair + freight.
Personal Shipments
C2C 35-77% duty, B2C 10-42% with proof.
Italy Returns
Export declaration + EORI/fiscal code.
Private Shipments
>150 EUR needs tax ID/EORI—UPS assists.
Info About Section Header: This section covers special rules for India shipments.
Simplified Form: - *Temp Import*: Ata Carnet (6 months exhibits), Triptyque (6-12 months vehicles).
- *Raw Materials*: Duty-free in warehouse—pay, reclaim on export.
- *Repairs*: List details, serial, repair cost—duty on repair + freight.

Info About Section Header: This section states value thresholds for India.

Content:
Max weight: 70 kg (150 lbs.)
Max length: 274 cm (107.9 in.)
Max dimensions: 400 cm (157.5 in.) length + girth
Info About Section Header: This section specifies max weight and size for India.
Simplified Form: - *Size*: Max length 274 cm (107.9 in.), length + girth 400 cm (157.5 in.).
